bufferTime.label: Buffer Time:

flexibility.label: Flexibility:

hero.headline: Book trusted professionals in minutes

features.title: Powerful booking features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to schedule services quickly and confidently

instantBooking.title: Instant & Approved Booking
instantBooking.description: Book immediately with verified professionals or request approval for custom needs. Get instant confirmation for standard services.

realTimeAvailability.title: Real-Time Availability
realTimeAvailability.description: See professional calendars and available time slots before booking. Never waste time requesting unavailable dates.

smartScheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
smartScheduling.description: Set up recurring bookings, sync with your calendar, and receive automated reminders before every service.

benefits.title: Why customers love our booking system

noPhoneTag.title: No more phone tag

transparentPricing.title: Transparent pricing

flexibleScheduling.title: Flexible scheduling
flexibleScheduling.description: Book one-time services or set up weekly, biweekly, or monthly recurring appointments with automatic discounts.

easyRescheduling.title: Easy rescheduling
easyRescheduling.description: Life happens. Reschedule or cancel bookings with just a few clicks, subject to professional's cancellation policy.

meta.title: Secure Payment Processing - Stripe Powered | Casaora
meta.description: Safe, transparent payments with Stripe. Track expenses, manage receipts, and handle tips all in one place. Secure escrow and automatic payouts.

hero.headline: Safe, transparent payments every time
hero.description: Secure payment processing with Stripe. Track expenses, manage receipts, and handle tips all in one place with complete transparency.

stripeIntegration.title: Secure Stripe Integration
stripeIntegration.description: Industry-standard payment security with encrypted transactions. Your card information never touches our servers.

transparentPricing.title: Transparent Pricing
transparentPricing.description: Clear breakdown of service fees, add-ons, and total costs before payment. No hidden charges or surprise fees.

automaticReceipts.title: Automatic Receipts
automaticReceipts.description: Digital receipts and expense tracking for every booking. Perfect for tax deductions and household budgets.

howItWorks.title: How payments work
howItWorks.description: Simple, secure, and transparent from start to finish

step1.title: Review Pricing
step1.description: See complete breakdown of base service, add-ons, and total before booking

step2.title: Authorize Payment
step2.description: Secure payment authorization through Stripe holds funds until service completion

step3.title: Service Completed
step3.description: Professional receives payment after service completion and check-out

step4.title: Get Receipt
step4.description: Automatic digital receipt with full transaction details sent to your email

booking.title: Booking confirmation - Authorization hold placed
booking.description: When you book, we place a temporary authorization hold on your card for the total amount. This isn't a charge yet - it just reserves the funds.

serviceDay.title: Service day - Check-in begins service
serviceDay.description: Professional checks in when they arrive. The authorization hold remains in place during the service. You can track service progress in real-time.

serviceComplete.title: Service complete - Check-out captures payment
serviceComplete.description: When the professional checks out and marks service complete, the authorization converts to an actual charge. This is when you're billed.

postService.title: Post-service - Receipt and payout processing
postService.description: You receive a digital receipt immediately. The professional receives their payout (minus platform fees) within 2-3 business days.

chargedAfter.title: Only charged after service completion
chargedAfter.description: Authorization holds aren't charges. You're only billed when the professional marks the service complete and checks out.

cancellation.title: Cancellation protections
cancellation.description: Cancel before the cancellation window closes and the hold releases automatically. No charge, no hassle, no questions asked.

dispute.title: Dispute resolution support
dispute.description: If service wasn't delivered as promised, contact support within 24 hours. We review disputes and process refunds when appropriate.

encrypted.title: Encrypted card storage
encrypted.description: Your payment information is tokenized and encrypted by Stripe. We never see or store your full card details on our servers.

debitCards.title: Debit Cards
debitCards.description: All major debit cards with card number and CVV

digitalReceipts.title: Digital Receipts
digitalReceipts.description: Automatic receipts sent via email for all transactions

cta.title: Ready for secure, transparent payments?
cta.description: Experience hassle-free payment processing backed by Stripe's industry-leading security

meta.title: Secure Messaging Platform - Direct Communication | Casaora
meta.description: Direct messaging unlocked after booking. Coordinate details, send photos, and stay connected throughout your service relationship. Booking-based security.

hero.headline: Communicate securely with your professionals
hero.description: Direct messaging unlocked after booking. Coordinate details, send photos, and stay connected throughout your service relationship.

features.title: Safe, convenient communication
features.subtitle: Built-in messaging that protects your privacy while enabling seamless coordination

bookingBased.title: Booking-Based Access
bookingBased.description: Messaging available only for confirmed bookings, ensuring safety and preventing spam. Your contact information stays private.

realTime.title: Real-Time Conversations
realTime.description: Instant message delivery with read receipts and notifications. Stay connected from booking confirmation to service completion.

photoSharing.title: Photo & File Sharing
photoSharing.description: Share instructions, references, and updates easily. Send photos of areas that need attention or special requests.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: Simple, secure messaging tied to your bookings

step1.title: Complete Booking
step1.description: Book a service with any professional to unlock messaging access

step2.title: Access Chat
step2.description: Find the conversation thread in your dashboard messages section

step3.title: Coordinate Details
step3.description: Discuss service details, timing, special requests, or access instructions

step4.title: Stay Connected
step4.description: Keep communication history for reference throughout your service relationship

benefits.title: Why our messaging system is different

privacy.title: Privacy protected
privacy.description: Your phone number and email stay private. All communication happens through the platform with full message history for safety.

noSpam.title: No spam or solicitation
noSpam.description: Only confirmed bookings unlock messaging. Professionals can't contact you without a booking, eliminating unwanted messages.

history.title: Message history & receipts
history.description: All messages are saved and tied to the booking. Perfect for referencing past conversations and instructions.

notifications.title: Real-time notifications
notifications.description: Get notified instantly when professionals respond. Never miss important updates about your booking.

items.access: Share building access codes and parking instructions
items.photos: Send photos of areas needing special attention
items.timing: Confirm arrival time and any last-minute changes
items.products: Discuss specific cleaning products or preferences

items.updates: Get updates on service progress and completion
items.questions: Answer questions about specific areas or items
items.beforeAfter: Receive before/after photos of completed work
items.realTime: Address any issues or requests in real-time

cta.title: Ready to experience seamless communication?
cta.description: Book your first service and unlock secure messaging with verified professionals

meta.title: Reviews & Ratings System - Two-Way Accountability | Casaora
meta.description: Community-driven trust and quality. Two-way reviews ensure accountability. Verified reviews only from real bookings. Build your reputation.

hero.headline: Community-driven trust and quality
hero.description: Two-way reviews ensure accountability. Rate professionals after every service and build your own reputation as a reliable customer.

features.title: Authentic feedback that matters
features.subtitle: Only real bookings, real experiences, and real accountability

verifiedBooking.title: Verified Booking Reviews
verifiedBooking.description: Only customers who completed bookings can leave reviews. Every review is tied to a real service, ensuring authenticity.

twoWay.title: Two-Way Accountability
twoWay.description: Professionals rate customers too, building mutual trust and respect. Great customers get better service and priority booking.

detailedCategories.title: Detailed Rating Categories
detailedCategories.description: Rate quality, communication, punctuality, and value separately. Get the full picture beyond a single star rating.

howItWorks.title: How reviews work
howItWorks.description: Simple, fair, and transparent for everyone

step1.title: Complete Service
step1.description: Finish a booking and ensure all check-in/check-out steps are done

step2.title: Receive Prompt
step2.description: Get a review request within 48 hours of service completion

step3.title: Rate Experience
step3.description: Rate across multiple categories with detailed feedback options

step4.title: Build Reputation
step4.description: Your review helps others and builds your customer reputation score

forProfessionals.title: For Professionals
forProfessionals.serviceQuality: Service Quality: Thoroughness, attention to detail, results
forProfessionals.value: Value: Fair pricing, worth the cost

mutualRespect.title: Mutual respect and fairness
mutualRespect.description: Two-way reviews mean customers and professionals both have accountability. This creates a respectful, professional environment for everyone.

verifiedOnly.title: Verified reviews only
verifiedOnly.description: No fake reviews, no incentivized ratings. Every review comes from a completed booking, ensuring authenticity and trust.

accountability.title: Platform-wide accountability
accountability.description: Low-rated users on either side get flagged for review. Repeat issues result in account suspension, keeping the platform safe for everyone.

balancedFeedback.title: Honest, balanced feedback
balancedFeedback.description: Detailed categories prevent unfair single-issue ratings. You can rate service quality highly while noting communication needs improvement.

cta.title: Join a community built on trust
cta.description: Start building your reputation today. Great customers and professionals both benefit from our two-way review system.

meta.title: Admin Dashboard - Platform Management Tools | Casaora
meta.description: Enterprise-grade admin tools for moderating professionals, reviewing bookings, processing payouts, and maintaining platform quality. Complete oversight.

hero.headline: Complete platform management and oversight
hero.description: Enterprise-grade admin tools for moderating professionals, reviewing bookings, processing payouts, and maintaining platform quality.

features.title: Comprehensive admin control
features.subtitle: Everything you need to manage and moderate the platform

professionalModeration.title: Professional Moderation
professionalModeration.description: Review applications, verify credentials, approve or reject profiles. Monitor ongoing performance and handle complaints.

bookingOversight.title: Booking Oversight
bookingOversight.description: View all bookings, resolve disputes, process refunds, and handle cancellations. Complete transaction visibility.

payoutProcessing.title: Payout Processing
payoutProcessing.description: Manage professional payouts, review financial transactions, handle disputes, and ensure platform fee compliance.

step1.title: Professional Onboarding
step1.description: Review applications, verify documents, and approve new professionals joining the platform

step2.title: Quality Monitoring
step2.description: Track ratings, review complaints, and identify professionals or customers needing attention

step3.title: Transaction Management
step3.description: Process payouts, handle disputes, manage refunds, and ensure proper fee collection

step4.title: Platform Health
step4.description: Monitor metrics, analyze trends, and maintain overall platform quality and safety

capabilities.title: Admin capabilities
capabilities.professionalManagement: Professional Management: Approve, suspend, or ban professional accounts
capabilities.bookingReview: Booking Review: View all transactions and service details
capabilities.payoutControl: Payout Control: Approve or hold professional payments
capabilities.disputeResolution: Dispute Resolution: Mediate conflicts and process refunds
capabilities.userModeration: User Moderation: Manage customer accounts and flags
capabilities.analytics: Analytics Dashboard: Platform metrics and business intelligence

roleBasedAccess.title: Role-based access control
roleBasedAccess.description: Different admin levels with specific permissions. Not all admins see everything - compartmentalized access for security.

auditLogs.title: Complete audit logging
auditLogs.description: Every admin action is logged with timestamps and user details. Full accountability for all platform changes.

dataProtection.title: Data protection and privacy
dataProtection.description: Sensitive customer data is masked. Admins see only what's necessary for their role, protecting user privacy.

twoFactorAuth.title: Two-factor authentication
twoFactorAuth.description: Admin accounts require 2FA for login. Additional verification for sensitive actions like payouts and bans.

tools.title: Available admin tools
tools.professionalApproval: Professional Approval: Review and approve new applications

professionals.title: For professionals

verification.question: How does Casaora verify professionals?
verification.answer: All professionals undergo a comprehensive screening process including background checks, reference verification, and skills assessment. We verify identity documents, work history, and conduct in-person interviews to ensure quality and safety.

payments.question: How do payments work?
payments.answer: When you book a service, we authorize a hold on your payment method. Funds are only captured after the service is completed. Professionals receive payment within 2-3 business days after service completion. All payments are processed securely through Stripe.

cancellation.question: What happens if I need to cancel?
cancellation.answer: You can cancel any booking before the scheduled start time through your dashboard. Cancellations made 24+ hours in advance receive a full refund. Cancellations within 24 hours may incur a cancellation fee to compensate the professional for their reserved time.

recurring.question: Can I book recurring services?
recurring.answer: Yes! During the booking process, you can set up recurring appointments on a weekly, biweekly, or monthly basis. This ensures you have consistent help and builds a long-term relationship with your preferred professional.

areas.question: What areas do you serve?
areas.answer: We currently operate across 6 major cities in Colombia including Bogot√°, Medell√≠n, Cali, Barranquilla, Cartagena, and Bucaramanga. We're actively expanding to new areas based on demand.

becomePro.question: How do I become a professional on Casaora?
becomePro.answer: Click 'Apply to join' and complete our application form. We'll review your information, conduct a background check, and schedule an interview. Once approved, you'll complete onboarding and can start accepting bookings. The entire process typically takes 5-7 business days.

howItWorks.title: How Casaora Pricing Works
howItWorks.description: We believe in complete transparency. You see exactly what you pay, what the professional earns, and what our platform fee covers.

step1.title: Professional Sets Their Rate
step1.description: Each professional sets their own hourly rate based on their experience, skills, and services offered.

step2.title: We Add Our Transparent Fee
step2.description: Casaora adds a clear platform fee on top of the professional‚Äôs rate. This fee funds vetting, support, and the technology that keeps everyone safe.

step3.title: You See the Total Upfront
step3.description: No hidden charges. The total you see at checkout is exactly what you pay.

calculator.title: Calculate Your Estimated Cost
calculator.description: Select your service, hours, and see the full breakdown instantly.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of satisfied customers who trust Casaora for verified, background-checked household services.

howItWorks.title: How You Get Paid
howItWorks.description: Set your own rates and keep 100% of what you charge. We add our platform fee on top, so customers pay it‚Äînot you.

setRate.title: You Set Your Rate
setRate.description: Choose your hourly rate based on your experience, skills, and the services you provide.

customerPays.title: Customer Pays Platform Fee
customerPays.description: We add a clearly-labeled platform fee on top of your rate. This fee is paid by the customer, not deducted from your earnings.

youReceive.title: You Receive 100%
youReceive.description: After service completion, you receive your full rate via weekly direct deposit to your bank account.

keyPoint.title: You Keep Every Peso You Charge
keyPoint.description: Unlike other platforms that take a cut from your earnings, Casaora adds our fee on top. If you charge 25,000 COP/hour, you receive 25,000 COP/hour.

calculator.title: Calculate Your Potential Earnings
calculator.description: See how much you could earn per week, month, and year based on your hourly rate and availability.

noHiddenFees.title: No Hidden Fees
noHiddenFees.description: You keep 100% of your rate. No surprise deductions or processing fees.

weeklyPayouts.title: Weekly Payouts
weeklyPayouts.description: Receive your earnings every week via direct deposit. Fast, reliable payments.

instantBooking.title: Instant Booking
instantBooking.description: Customers can book you directly. More bookings = more income.

earnMore.title: Earn More Than Competitors
earnMore.description: Because we don't cut your rate, you keep everything you charge‚Äîno surprise deductions or hidden commissions.

feeCovers.title: What Does the Platform Fee Cover?
feeCovers.description: Our platform fee (paid by customers) funds the services that bring you clients and keep you safe.

earnings.title: Calculate Your Earnings
earnings.subtitle: See exactly how much you'll earn with Casaora. Set your rate and hours to get your potential income.

transparency.title: How Pricing Works
transparency.note: You keep 100% of your hourly rate. The platform fee is added on top and paid by the customer.

faq.title: Pricing FAQ
faq.subtitle: Common questions about how Casaora pricing works.

howMuchDoesItCost.question: How much does it cost to use Casaora?
howMuchDoesItCost.answer: For customers: You pay the professional's rate plus a clearly-labeled Casaora platform fee. For professionals: It's free to join. You keep 100% of your rate‚Äîcustomers pay the platform fee.

whyPlatformFee.question: Why is there a platform fee?
whyPlatformFee.answer: The platform fee covers background checks, insurance, payment processing, 24/7 support, and the technology that keeps Casaora safe and reliable. It ensures you're working with verified professionals.

conciergeService.question: How does the concierge matching service work?
conciergeService.answer: Our concierge team matches you with thoroughly vetted professionals based on your needs. We provide English-speaking coordinators, handle all communication, offer priority booking, and include a satisfaction guarantee. We're currently building our professional network in Medell√≠n ‚Äî share your needs and we'll notify you when we have perfect matches ready.

professionalKeepsRate.question: Do professionals really keep 100% of their rate?
professionalKeepsRate.answer: Yes! If a professional charges 25,000 COP/hour, they receive 25,000 COP/hour. The platform fee is added on top and paid by the customer. This is different from other platforms that deduct fees from professional earnings.

paymentSecurity.question: How are payments secured?
paymentSecurity.answer: All payments are processed through Stripe with escrow protection. Funds are authorized when you book, but only captured after service completion. If there's a dispute, we handle refunds fairly.

cancellationPolicy.question: What's the cancellation policy?
cancellationPolicy.answer: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before service. Late cancellations (within 24 hours) incur a 50% fee to compensate professionals for lost work.

meta.title: About Us - Our Story | Casaora
meta.description: Learn about Casaora's mission to connect expats in Colombia with trusted, bilingual domestic service professionals through our concierge matching service.

story.title: Bridging Cultures, Building Trust
story.subtitle: We're building a trusted concierge service that connects foreigners in Colombia with verified, bilingual domestic service professionals.

problem.title: The Challenge We're Solving
problem.paragraph1: Moving to a new country is exciting‚Äîbut finding reliable domestic help shouldn't be stressful. Expats in Colombia face language barriers, uncertainty about trust and safety, and a lack of vetted professionals who understand their needs.
problem.paragraph2: Traditional word-of-mouth recommendations are limited, and existing platforms don't offer the bilingual support, verification, or ongoing concierge assistance that foreigners truly need.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.paragraph1: Casaora is a concierge service designed specifically for expats. We combine technology with human touch to create a seamless, trustworthy experience:

feature1.title: Verified Professionals
feature1.description: Every professional goes through background checks, ID verification, and skills assessment before joining our platform.

feature2.title: Bilingual Support
feature2.description: Our entire platform and concierge team operates in both English and Spanish, eliminating communication barriers.

feature3.title: Ongoing Assistance
feature3.description: From booking to completion, our concierge team is available to help resolve any issues and ensure quality service.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.paragraph1: Founded by expats who experienced these challenges firsthand, Casaora was born from a simple idea: finding trustworthy domestic help in a foreign country should be easy, safe, and stress-free. Today, we're proud to serve hundreds of expat families and empower local professionals across Colombia.

missionVision.sectionSubtitle: We're on a mission to make domestic services accessible, transparent, and trustworthy for everyone.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To connect foreigners living in Colombia with verified, bilingual domestic service professionals through a secure, transparent concierge service powered by modern technology.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the most trusted platform for expat services across Latin America, empowering both customers and professionals with safety, transparency, and opportunity.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: These principles guide everything we do

trust.title: Trust First
trust.description: We verify every professional and maintain transparent communication to earn and keep your trust.

quality.title: Quality Service
quality.description: We set high standards for professionals and continuously monitor service quality through reviews and feedback.

bilingual.title: Bilingual Excellence
bilingual.description: We eliminate language barriers by supporting both English and Spanish across our entire platform.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: We empower both expats to find reliable help and local professionals to grow sustainable businesses.

team.title: Our Remote-First Team
team.subtitle: We're a distributed team spanning Colombia and the United States, united by our mission to serve expats and professionals.

remoteFirst.title: Built for Global Impact
remoteFirst.description: As a remote-first company, we practice what we preach. Our distributed team brings diverse perspectives, deep local knowledge, and a genuine understanding of the expat experience. We work asynchronously across time zones to provide 24/7 support for our community.

distributed.title: Globally Distributed
distributed.description: Our team spans Colombia and the US, giving us deep insight into both expat and local needs.

bilingual.title: Fully Bilingual
bilingual.description: Every team member speaks both English and Spanish fluently, ensuring seamless communication.

available.title: Always Available
available.description: With team members across time zones, we provide responsive support when you need it.

expertise.title: Diverse Expertise
expertise.description: Our backgrounds in hospitality, tech, and operations bring well-rounded solutions to complex challenges.

joinTeam.title: Want to Join Our Mission?
joinTeam.description: We're always looking for passionate people who want to make a difference in the lives of expats and professionals.

trust.title: Why Trust Casaora?
trust.subtitle: Safety, security, and transparency are at the core of everything we do.

verification.title: Verified Professionals
verification.description: Background checks, ID verification, and skills assessment for every professional on our platform.

secure.title: Secure Payments
secure.description: All transactions are processed through Stripe with bank-level encryption and buyer protection.

support.title: Concierge Support
support.description: Our bilingual team is available to help resolve any issues before, during, and after your service.

transparency.title: Full Transparency
transparency.description: Verified reviews, clear pricing, and detailed professional profiles so you can book with confidence.

cta.title: Ready to Experience the Difference?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of expats who trust Casaora for their domestic service needs.

meta.title: How It Works - Instant Booking or Permanent Hire | Casaora
meta.description: Choose between Amara AI for instant bookings (15% fee) or our Direct Hire Program ($299) for permanent placements with legal contracts and guarantees.

hero.title: How Casaora Works
hero.subtitle: Two ways to hire: Chat with Amara AI for instant bookings, or use our concierge for permanent placements with legal contracts and a 30-day guarantee.

customer.title: For Customers
customer.subtitle: Amara Instant Book (15% fee) or Direct Hire Program ($299 one-time)

search.title: Choose your hiring path
search.description: Need help tomorrow? Chat with Amara AI. Hiring full-time? Use our Direct Hire Program with legal contracts and a $299 one-time fee.

book.title: Get matched instantly or through concierge
book.description: Amara books you in 2 minutes. Our concierge curates candidates for permanent roles, complete with background checks and interviews.

service.title: Book or hire with confidence
service.description: Hourly bookings include messaging and ratings. Direct hires get legal contracts (EN/ES), direct contact, and a 30-day replacement guarantee.

review.title: Zero commission for professionals
review.description: Professionals keep 100% of their hourly rate. We charge customers a 15% platform fee or a $299 placement fee for direct hires.

professional.title: For Professionals
professional.subtitle: Grow your business in 5 straightforward steps

apply.title: Apply to Join
apply.description: Fill out our simple application with your experience, skills, and availability. The process takes less than 10 minutes.

verify.title: Get Verified
verify.description: Complete background checks, ID verification, and skills assessment. Our concierge team guides you through every step in English or Spanish.

match.title: Get Matched
match.description: Create your profile, set your rates, and get matched with customers who need your services. You're in control of your schedule.

serve.title: Deliver Great Service
serve.description: Show up on time, provide excellent service, and build your reputation through customer reviews and ratings.

earn.title: Keep 100% of Your Rate
earn.description: Unlike apps that take 20-30%, Casaora charges customers a separate fee. If you charge 20,000 COP, you keep 20,000 COP. This is why the best talent works with us.

safety.title: Safety & Trust
safety.subtitle: Your security is our top priority. Here's how we keep you protected.

verification.title: Rigorous Verification
verification.description: Every professional undergoes background checks, ID verification, and skills assessment before joining our platform. We continuously monitor quality through reviews.

payments.title: Secure Payments
payments.description: All payments are processed through Stripe with bank-level encryption. Customers are protected, and professionals get paid reliably after each job.

support.title: 24/7 Concierge Support
support.description: Our bilingual support team is available around the clock to help resolve any issues, answer questions, and ensure smooth service delivery.

q1.question: How are professionals verified?
q1.answer: Every professional goes through a comprehensive verification process including background checks, ID verification, reference checks, and skills assessment. We also continuously monitor service quality through customer reviews and ratings.

q2.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the service?
q2.answer: Your satisfaction is guaranteed. If you're not happy with a service, contact our concierge team within 24 hours and we'll work to resolve the issue‚Äîwhether that's arranging a redo, finding a different professional, or issuing a refund.

q3.question: How do payments work?
q3.answer: For customers: Pay securely through the platform using credit/debit cards or bank transfers. Your payment is held securely until the service is completed. For professionals: You receive payment automatically after each completed job, minus our small service fee.

q4.question: Can I communicate in English even though I'm in Colombia?
q4.answer: Absolutely! Our entire platform, support team, and many of our professionals are fully bilingual. You can browse, book, and get support entirely in English or Spanish‚Äîwhatever you're most comfortable with.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of customers and professionals who trust Casaora.

serviceOptions.title: Choose Your Path
serviceOptions.subtitle: Select the service level that fits your needs‚Äîinstant booking for quick jobs or white-glove concierge for permanent placements.

instantBook.description: Perfect for cleaning, babysitting, one-off help, and short-term projects.

directHireValue.title: Hiring Full-Time? Here's What the Direct Hire Fee Covers
directHireValue.subtitle: Our $299 Direct Hire Fee isn't just a charge‚Äîit's comprehensive protection and peace of mind for permanent placements.

benefits.title: Legal Safety
benefits.description: Bilingual contract templates compliant with Colombian labor law. Protect yourself and your employee.

benefits.title: Background Check
benefits.description: Full judicial & disciplinary records report. Know exactly who you're hiring.

benefits.title: Medical & Pension Setup
benefits.description: Step-by-step 'Pila' setup guide for Colombian social security compliance.

benefits.title: 30-Day Guarantee
benefits.description: If it doesn't work out, we replace them for free. Zero risk for you.

weeklyHoursEditor.title: Working Hours
weeklyHoursEditor.helpDescription: Customers can only book you during these hours. Be specific to avoid conflicts.

quickJob.title: Amara Instant Book

longTermHire.title: Direct Hire Program

serviceSelectionWidget.helpText: Zero commission for professionals on hourly bookings. Full support for both options.

cookieConsent.title: We use cookies
cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to improve your experience, analyze site traffic, and provide personalized content. By clicking "Accept", you consent to our use of cookies.

threeWaysToEarn.title: Build Your Career Ladder
threeWaysToEarn.subtitle: Start with gigs, grow to regulars, land full-time ‚Äî 100% commission-free at every level

instantBookings.title: Level 1: Instant Bookings
instantBookings.description: Fill gaps in your schedule with one-time gigs. Keep 100% of your hourly rate ‚Äî we charge families a 15% platform fee, never you.

recurringRegulars.title: Level 2: Recurring Regulars
recurringRegulars.description: Build steady weekly income with families who book you repeatedly. Zero commission, just reliable paychecks.

directPlacement.title: Level 3: Full-Time Placement
directPlacement.description: Ready for stability? Families pay us a $299 finder's fee for permanent placements ‚Äî you pay nothing and get legal contracts.

threeWaysToEarn.ctaText: Interested in full-time? Check "Open to Full-Time" on your profile to appear in premium family searches.
